product.longDescription: This one-of-a-kind blonde leaf with ruffled texture adds loft and a pop of color to salad mixes. A non-heading Chinese cabbage that has buttery leaves with a crunchy rib and mild flavor. At full size, softly curled leaves on narrow, white petioles can be sold as bunched greens. Thin to 4–8" for full-size heads for bunching. Also available in organic seed. Avg. 9,050 seeds/oz. Packet: 250 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Fast growing with great color contrast for mixes.
